Description: Decorative band from a tiraz fragment, woven in undyed, yellow and red silk; decorated with a pseudo-Kufic inscription in beige on a red background, edged by two friezes of yellow and red stylised vegetal interlacing. Warp:silk, undyed, I, 22/cm Weft: silk, undyed, yellow and red, I, 72/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
